generated_body: The article is likely to provide an overview of the recent high tides in Venice, detailing how local residents are responding to the phenomenon to protect their historic art and architecture. Additionally, the article could include insights into the historical significance of the artwork at risk and the ongoing challenges Venice faces with rising tides.
